page.title: 07Witherley Football Club
page.content:
The club opened in 1964. There are 300 members. The people who started the club from the beginning were Mr Albrighton, Mr Grey and Mr Hall. They have two football teams and 30 players.
The Club is sponsored by a firm called Witherley Services. They raise money by Tote and Blackout cards. Sometimes they have coffee mornings.
They have changed the club pavilion into a social club. They have darts matches and tables outside for drinks.
They go on holidays to Germany and Switzerland.
The football club has its own football team.
